content:
Hi! My name is Borja Menéndez and I’m a PhD in Operations Research fascinated about Artificial Intelligence and technology in general, with a focus on the design and development of algorithms. Metaheuristics passionate, I’ve also developed optimization engines applying Linear and Constraint Programming techniques.
Currently working with Ising models to efficiently solve hard combinatorial optimization problems within a Quantum-inspired computer: Digital Annealer. Eager to keep learning and applying knowledge to solve challenging problems.
